message.body: hey there...day 4 of which bathroom?
both
currently grouting my cousins bath floor, then tiling mine this afternoon
you're a madman
dont think you would get much argument there
hows the kitchen floor lookin?
looks great. the finish really shined it up nicely.
totally sweet! any cabinets go in yet?
nooo, I got the last coat of finish on tuesday night, then installed the sink temporarily, which was harder than it shouldda been. was outta town for the weekend.
did some electrical last night, hope to finish that today...
then I can do the lower drywall, then the cabinets can go in.
oh, right. the drywall needs to go in first.
arent you leaving for washington soon?
yup, on monday
you hoping to finish up this weekend then
finish as in finish?
nah finish as in semi-functional
I'd like to do that drywall and get the fridge back in the ktichen before I leave.
base cabinets are still at your parents then. Thats not too bad, you shouldnt have much trouble getting that done
is your toilet out?
lol...time is the only issue, but otherwise, I am optimistic
nope, I am doing my floor in sections, I pulled the vanity out and am doing that side first
once that is in, then I will do the other side
interesting...is it a big bathroom?
tomorrow I am installing my cousins new toilet and vanity and his is done for now
his is fairly small, about 32 sf. mine is around 45 sf
is that you're "work " for the week?
tomorrow I am installing my cousins new toilet and vanity and his is done for now his is fairly small, about 32 sf. mine is around 45 sf
said that you didnt receive my chat so I resent
I did receive your chat
lol
yeah, I worked on it the end of last week and today and tomorrow, but I still have real work to do as well
google is a liar!
ok, well I gotta go. I'm getting to distracted to be productive....must write paper
must indeed. good luck
and to you
thx. I though about you this wkend, by the way...
lol...why did you get frustrated by something?
I thought about you too.....
I've appreciated your honestly and "up front ness"
No...haha, not frustrated. Just a little confused and conflicted about...
thinking about some of the things you said about your relationships w/ men changing...and how I feel the same w. my relations w/ women lately
and uncharted territory....but I am distracting you. Perhaps another time, or an email if I feel inclined
changing in what way?
as is not being in a relationship all the time
and being up front about it, and being honest about just not expecting anything to develop
....yeahhh
not always looking for the perfect girl
because there is no such thing
and at the same time, not understanding what it is about that I find so attractive
well my friend...the grass is always greener
lol
did you get my last one?
but yes, explore, have fun...I think it's a great idea
about not understanding what you're finding attractive?
yeah, funny how I accidentally forgot the word "you" in that
lol...oh, yeah...that makes a difference.
a little
k, go write papers. buh-bye!
funny.
